archimate:Product.name: Ferma
archimate:Product.documentation: http://syncleus.com/Ferma/ Today Ferma is a robust framework that takes on a role similar to an Object-relational Model (ORM) library for traditional databases. Ferma is often referred to as a Object-graph Model (OGM) library, and maps Java objects to elements in a graph such as a Vertex or an Edges. In short it allows a schema to be defined using java interfaces and classes which provides a level of abstraction for interacting with the underlying graph.
